Title: DevOps Engineer
Description:
About this opportunity :
We are searching for competent candidates to reinforce our main network and service operations automation with DevOps capabilities using Python (good to have Golang knowledge). Can help in Designing, building, testing, and maintaining the continuous integration and continuous delivery (CI/CD) using Jenkins or Git Pipeline.
We believe in trust – we trust each other to do the right things!
We believe in taking decisions as close to the product and technical expertise as possible.
We believe in creativity – trying new things and learning from our mistakes.
We believe in sharing our insights and helping one another to build an even better user plane.
We truly believe in happiness, we enjoy and feel passionate about what we do and value each other’s technical competence deeply.
What you will do :
Will responsible for network and service operations automation with DevOps capabilities using Python (good to have Golang).
Requirement gathering.
Investigation & help in technical design.
Creating and setting up infrastructure on-premises/ on-cloud.
Developing automation code for creating CI/CD pipelines.
Build and deployment.
Helping in testing automation as part of Pipeline Creation.
Solve, and support for automation of Pipeline.
You will bring :
Bachelor's and master’s degrees in Computer Science.
Technical Competencies
Automation knowledge using Python /GoLang!
Good experience of AWS / Any Cloud Experience!
Designing, building, testing, and maintaining the CI/CD process using Jenkins or Git Pipeline.
Choosing the best tools and technologies the team requires to meet the business needs.
SQL Knowledge to perform queries for Data Verification.
Build tools like Make, Maven, or Gradle.
Automating different phases of the DevOps pipeline using Ansible/puppet.
Monitoring systems for malicious activity.
Performing on-call service.
Ensuring system availability.
Integrating and connecting application elements using Python/GoLang (APIs, libraries, SDKs, etc.).
Why join Ericsson?
At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.

Title: Associate DevOps Engineer
Description:
At Boeing, we innovate and collaborate to make the world a better place. From the seabed to outer space, you can contribute to work that matters with a company where diversity, equity and inclusion are shared values. We’re committed to fostering an environment for every teammate that’s welcoming, respectful and inclusive, with great opportunity for professional growth. Find your future with us.
Overview
Boeing is the world’s largest aerospace company and a leading provider of commercial airplanes, defense, space, and security systems, and global services. Building on a legacy of over a century of innovation and leadership, Boeing continues to lead the way in technology and innovation, customer delivery, and investment in its people and future growth of aerospace.
In India, Boeing has been a strong partner to the Indian aerospace and defense sectors for more than 75 years. People at Boeing have been supporting mission readiness and modernization of India’s defense forces, and enabling connected, safer, and smarter flying experiences, in the sky, in the seas, and in space.
Technology for today and tomorrow
The Boeing India Engineering & Technology Center (BIETC) is a 3000+ diverse engineering workforce that contributes to global aerospace growth. Our engineers deliver cutting-edge R&D, innovation, and high-quality engineering work in global markets, and leverage new-age technologies such as AI/ML, IIoT, Cloud, Model-Based Engineering, and Additive Manufacturing, shaping the future of aerospace.
People-driven culture
At Boeing, we believe creativity and innovation thrives when every employee is trusted, empowered, and has the flexibility to choose, grow, learn, and explore. We offer variable arrangements depending upon business and customer needs, and professional pursuits that offer greater flexibility in the way our people work. We also believe that collaboration, frequent team engagements, and face-to-face meetings bring diverse perspectives and thoughts – enabling every voice to be heard and every perspective to be respected. No matter where or how our teammates work, we are committed to positively shaping people’s careers and being thoughtful about employee wellbeing.
At Boeing, we are inclusive, diverse, and transformative.
With us, you can create and contribute to what matters most in your career, community, country, and world. Join us in powering the progress of global aerospace.
At Boeing, we are all innovators on a mission to connect, protect, explore and inspire. From the seabed to outer space, you’ll learn and grow, contributing to work that shapes the world. Find your future with us.
Boeing India Engineering organization is currently looking for Associate Devops Engineer to join their team in Bengaluru, KA. As a DevOps Engineer, you will be part of the Boeing Global Services Digital Solutions team, which develops software applications and products that create direct value to its customers. We provide re-vamped work environments focused on delivering data-driven solutions at a rapidly increased pace over traditional development. Be a part of our passionate and motivated team who are excited to use the latest in software technologies for modern web and mobile application development. Through our products we deliver innovative solutions to our global customer base at an accelerated pace.
Position Responsibilities:
The selected individual will work in the Boeing India Engineering and Technology Center (BIETC) in Bangalore, India.
As a software developer, the selected individual will work in the BIETC Boeing Global Services (BGS) engineering team to develop, maintain and improve Web applications.
Should have experience in Software Engineering Domain with evidence of thorough understanding of requirements to solve problems and actively participates in software development.
Should have excellent communication and presentation skills
Should have demonstrated ability to work in an AGILE environment.
Demonstrated ability to create positive impact on customer by developing polished, cohesive, effective, and user friendly web applications.
Must have experience working with cross-functional teams spread across multiple products and locations within Boeing and external partners.
Must be flexible, with a high tolerance for organizational complexity and ability to work with partners from within Boeing and outside, across different cultures and time-zones.
Candidate must be a self-starter with a positive attitude, high ethics, strong analytical and creative problem solving skills and a track record of working successfully under pressure in a time-constrained environment.
Ability to independently execute & deliver on the backlog without dependency or hand-holding.
Should be an excellent team player.
Work in an Agile Scrum team following the best practices on Software Craftsmanship such as Test-driven development and Pair Programming/Peer Reviews.
The selected individual will be a skilled, highly professional engineer, work collaboratively with an international team comprising software development, product management, and business analysis.
Mentors junior team members on technical aspects. The selected individual will also be responsible to provide support to development of internal competency and resources for critical skill sets and be a sought-after expert that other developers can benefit from.
This position provides periodic updates to Boeing management in the form of progress reports, project summaries, and other related documents. This position will also be responsible for coordinating and communicating regularly with experts in Boeing organizations around the world.
Research and recommend new technologies to improve the product development activities.
Travel domestically and internationally, as required.
Employer will not sponsor applicants for employment visa status.
Basic Qualifications (Required Skills/Experience):
Bachelor’s Degree with 5+ years of experience or Master’s Degree with 4+ years of experience is must
Hands on knowledge in the Designing and Developing full stack modules and components for web applications. This position must also have a supporting on development work who has excellent programming skills in the latest tools & technology frameworks like ReactJS, AngularJS, NodeJS, Bootstrap, HTML5, CSS3, Javascript, JQuery, Java8/J2EE, Docker, Kubernetes.
Should be seasoned on Devops day-today activities.
Experience in automated test is essential.
Must have experience with Spring Framework, Docker Containers, Kubernetes, REST & SOAP based Web Services and SOA, MySQL, PostgreSQL, and any other relational databases,. Experience with SOA including Micro services based architecture.
Familiarity and/or experience with public cloud infrastructure and technologies such as Azure or Amazon Web Services (AWS) is a plus.
Experience in database modelling (MySQL/NoSQL databases such as Mongo DB)
Desire to learn and conduct hands-on experimentation, product evaluations and proof of concepts in various diverse array of technologies.
Hands-on experience with Build and Deployment tools and languages. Experience in best practices and tools around CI/CD.
Knowledge and usage of sonarqube to perform continuous inspection of code quality to perform automatic reviews with static analysis of code to detect bugs, code smells, and security vulnerabilities.
Sound knowledge on static code analysis tool like Coverity tool.
Knowledge of integrating with Ant, Maven, GIT and Shell scripting.
Strong backend experience to develop Data Layer using at least one of the ORM frameworks like Hibernate, JPA etc.
Good knowledge of database concepts with knowledge on writing SQL Queries and Stored Procedures.
Excellent knowledge and experience of Maven, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Delivery with Jenkins.
Can follow the best practices on Test-driven development
Strong believer of DevOps methodology.
Effectively resolve problems and roadblocks as they occur, consistently following through on details while driving innovation as well as issue resolution.
Monitor the implementation of design throughout the system development lifecycle and seek and provide clarification when needed.
Must have experience working with cross-functional teams spread across multiple products and locations within Boeing and external partners, across different cultures and time-zones.
Collaborate effectively with a team of development engineers, QA/Testing, Build, and Project Management.
Preferred Qualifications (Desired Skills/Experience):
Monitor the implementation of architecture throughout the system development lifecycle and seek and provide clarification when needed.
Must have experience working with cross-functional teams spread across multiple products and locations within Boeing and external partners, across different cultures and time-zones
Experience developing airline operations software applications would be a plus, but not required.
Collaborate effectively with a team of development engineers, QA/Testing, Build, and Project Management.
Good understanding of NOTAM's, Experienced with Navigation databases, Flight planning and dispatch solutions, knowledge on EFB applications, ARINC 633 format (any ARINC standards), Hands on Navigation maps (airport maps , obstacle , aviation databases), eNOTAMS
Knowledgeable about airline flight operations and piloting procedures
Flight Management System (FMS) domain knowledge
Flight Support Service (FSS) knowledge
Knowledge on Weather, Wind updates, GRIB, , Navigation database, Notams, CRAM/CDR, Brief idea on enroute charges and Tracks, ACARS, Euro control B2B feeds

Super Six Sports Gaming (SSSG) is a sports tech organisation which focuses on building world class products in the domain of sports on the back of technology, with the single point agenda of driving sports engagement in the country. The company was launched in 2020 and has ever since identified three key levers of sports engagement and built brands focussing on those levers in their journey of creating a sporting ecosystem in the country. The above mentioned levers, along with the respective SSSG brand in the domain, has been explained in detail below:-
A short brief about the products
Fantasy Sports | Brand Name: Fantasy Akhada - is one of India's Top 5 fantasy sports platforms with Harsha Bhogle as the Brand Ambassador. Over 5 million registered users.

DevOps Engineer (Hurreh Technologies Pvt Ltd)
We are Hurreh Technologies Pvt Ltd, a leading provider of advanced software solutions, and we're looking for a motivated DevOps Engineer to join our team.
The DevOps Engineer will be responsible for managing all aspects of our DevOps practice and promoting continual improvement and automation for our development, testing, and deployment process. •Design, implement, and maintain tooling for the secure deployment, configuration, and support of distributed applications.

Description:
Senior Analyst – DevOps Engineer- Technology and Infrastructure – Deloitte Support Services India Pvt Ltd
USI T&I CMS - DevOps Engineer
Technology & Infrastructure - Office of the Deputy CIO for Technology
Overview
The CMS Group reports to the office of the Deputy CIO for Technology and is responsible for delivering DevOps services which accelerate the delivery of both revenue-generating and internal applications. The DevOps group flexes to support business-lead software development while bring to bear best practices which streamline and fully automate the release management pipeline.
In your role as the Cloud DevOps Engineer, you will be responsible for the Cloud infra setup, design of multi-cloud solutions & perform Cloud operations work on multi cloud. You will need to coordinate with the Delivery Manager, Software Architects, Software Developers, and Cloud Architects & Engineers to design the Cloud Infrastructure for a large distributed solution. You will ensure Application solution is appropriate for the Cloud and become the trusted advisor of the software development team. You will ensure that Cloud Architecture allows for the DevOps philosophy to be embraced. You will ensure designs allow for the implementation of tools and processes which enable rapid development and delivery of software, continuous integration/deployment, automated quality checks, and operational metrics that can be consumed by development teams.
An ideal candidate for this role will have a blend of infrastructure, development and operational experience that provides them with a good understanding of the developers they are working with, while also balancing customer satisfaction and maintaining critical systems uptime.
In this role you will partner with your DevOps peers – DevOps Release Managers and DevOps Platform Engineers – to deliver a fully automated end-to-end release management process.
Technical Responsibilities:
5+ years of experience in any Cloud (Azure, AWS or GCP) and other cloud solutions with infra setup in IaaS, PaaS & SaaS along with maintenance, support, enhancement, operations, coding & developer skillsets.
Hands-on industry work experience of design/build of DevOps CI/CD pipelines on the public cloud environments, preferably AWS and Azure Fluency in development tools like Ansible, PowerShell and added advantage if knowledge on programming languages like (e.g., Python, Java, Go, Bash scripting, .NET, C#).
Should have strong experience on automations using Terraform, Docker, Kubernetes, ARM templates, AI/ML etc.
Hands-on experience with AWS services for IAAS and PAAS products and features such as VPC, EC2, Containers, S3, DynamoDB, Lambda, RDS, Route53, Cloud Formation templates, Cloud Watch, IAM, Elastic Bean Stalk, Cloud Trail, API Gateways is and added advantage.
Hands-on experience in On-Prem to Cloud migrations, landing zones creation, subscription, resource groups, policies, firewall setup, application load balance setup & advanced knowledge on operations as well as cloud networking methodologies.
Experienced in designing/implementing Virtual Private Cloud VPC environments including compute, storage, database, networking, security etc. in the AWS ecosystem with HA / DR strategies Extensive experience supporting and scaling production systems
Experience in OS like Windows and Linux is a must.
Excellent communication skills, understanding customer needs, negotiations skills.
Desired:
Certified Azure/AWS/GCP engineer.
Should have implemented many architectural designs and driven projects in IaaS, PaaS & SaaS
Exposure to API architecture and development
Experience: 5+ years
Location – Hyderabad (Bengaluru, Mumbai, Pune, Gurugram
Shift Timing: 12 to 9 PM IST

Title: DevOps Engineer
Description:
DevOps Engineer (Hurreh Technologies Pvt Ltd)
We are Hurreh Technologies Pvt Ltd, a leading provider of advanced software solutions, and we're looking for a motivated DevOps Engineer to join our team.
The DevOps Engineer will be responsible for managing all aspects of our DevOps practice and promoting continual improvement and automation for our development, testing, and deployment process. This role involves combining software engineering and system administration to manage our software delivery pipeline, deploy code to our server environments, and ensure the availability and scalability of our platforms.
What you'll do:
•Manage the build, test, and deployment pipelines to support automated application packaging, installation, and configuration.
•Develop and maintain Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) processes, pipelines, and workflows.
•Work with developers to ensure all code is properly configured, tested, and deployed.
•Proactively identify potential problems and solutions for optimization of code delivery pipeline.
•Monitor and maintain server and network infrastructure, including deployments and updates.
•Design, implement, and maintain tooling for the secure deployment, configuration, and support of distributed applications.
What you'll need:
•3 years of experience in a DevOps or software engineering role
•Strong knowledge of CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, Github, and Kubernetes
•Proficiency in scripting languages such as Bash and Python
•Experience working with cloud platforms such as Google Cloud Platform and Amazon Web Services
•Familiarity with containerization and virtualization technologies
•Excellent communication and problem-solving skills
•Exceptional attention to detail
If you're interested in joining our ambitious and forward-thinking team, apply now and let us know why you are the ideal DevOps Engineer for Hurreh Technologies. We look forward to hearing from you!
Apply Now

With a startup spirit and 115,000+curious and courageous minds, we have the expertise to go deep with the world’s biggest brands—and we have fun doing it! We dream in digital, dare in reality, and reinvent the ways companies work to make an impact far bigger than just our bottom line. Now, we’re calling upon the thinkers and doers, those with a natural curiosity and a hunger to keep learning, keep growing. People who thrive on fearlessly experimenting, seizing opportunities, and pushing boundaries to turn our vision into reality. And as you help us create a better world, we will help you build your own intellectual firepower.

Welcome to the relentless pursuit of better.
Inviting application for the role of Management Trainee-DevOps Engineer
We are seeking a talented and experienced DevOps Engineer to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of AWS services and a proven track record of expertise with AWS CloudFormation, along with other tools commonly used by DevOps professionals.
Responsibilities:
Build and manage the infrastructure for our applications, using AWS services like EC2, RDS, S3, CloudFront, CloudFormation, etc.
Build and manage the infrastructure for our Datalake, using AWS services like Glue, Glue Catalog, RDS, DynamoDB, Redshift, CloudFormation, DMS etc.
Create and maintain automation scripts for the deployment and management of applications and services using CloudFormation.
Work closely with development teams to ensure proper integration of infrastructure and Application code for Application components.
Work closely with Datalaketeams to ensure proper integration of infrastructure and Datalake code for Datalake components.
Implement, Deploy & maintain infrastructure stacks which are already deployed in production.
Monitor and troubleshoot application, Datalake and infrastructure issues.
Develop and maintain DevOps-related documentation.
Continuously evaluate and improve our DevOps processes and practices.
Stay up to date with the latest DevOps tools and trends.

Qualifications we seek in you!
Minimum Qualifications
